ground_truth: Norman looks at a picture hanging on the far end of the wall he is leaning against, reaches it, touches it, and reluctantly lifts the small frame off the wall. A tiny circle of light hits Norman's face from the hole in the wall behind the picture. This end of the room is very dim, allowing us to see clearly the light striking Norman's face. We move close to Norman, extremely close, until his profile fills the screen, and the tiny spot of light hits his eye. We see the small hole through which the light comes, and Norman peeps through. Through the hole, we look into Mary's cabin and see Mary undressing; she is in her bra and half-slip. She stoops over a bit, places her hands behind her upper back, and begins to unhook her bra. Norman watches as Mary removes her bra, and we see his eye run up and down the unseen figure of Mary. Mary is just slipping into a robe, covering her complete nudity. Norman turns from the hole, faces us for a moment, continues turning until he can look out the small parlor window. Quickly and precisely, he rehangs the picture over the hole in the wall, turns, and starts out of the parlor. We see him go through the office and out onto the porch, not even bothering to close the door behind him. Norman walks along the porch, in the direction of the big house. Once on the path, he pauses, looks up at the light in the bedroom window, then pulls himself up, squares his shoulders, and strides manfully up the path. He opens the door of the house and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the stairway and look up at the bedroom door just at the head of the stair. He bypasses the stairs and slowly makes his way to the kitchen at the far end of the hall. He enters the kitchen and drops wearily into a chair. Meanwhile, Mary is seated at a small desk, engrossed in figuring in a small notebook. After a moment, she tears the page out of the notebook and, rising, begins to rip it into small pieces. She goes into the bathroom, drops the pieces into the toilet bowl, and flushes the toilet. Then she drops her robe, steps into the tub, and turns the shower on. For a moment, we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a woman fall across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, grasps the shower curtain, and rips it aside, causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Norman glances at a picture suspended on the far end of the wall he is reclining against, reaches it, touches it, and unwillingly lifts the small frame off the wall. A tiny circle of illumination strikes Norman's visage from the aperture in the wall behind the picture. This end of the chamber is very shadowy, allowing us to see clearly the light striking Norman's face. Through the hole, we look into Mary's cabin and see Mary disrobing; she is in her bra and half-slip. She bends over a bit, places her hands behind her upper back, and begins to unfasten her bra. Norman observes as Mary removes her bra, and we see his eye travel up and down the unseen figure of Mary. Mary is just slipping into a robe, covering her complete nudity. Norman turns from the hole, faces us for a moment, continues turning until he can gaze out the small parlor window. Quickly and precisely, he rehangs the picture over the hole in the wall, turns, and starts out of the parlor. We see him go through the office and out onto the porch, not even bothering to close the door behind him. Norman strolls along the porch, in the direction of the big house. Once on the path, he hesitates, looks up at the light in the bedroom window, then pulls himself up, squares his shoulders, and strides manfully up the path. He opens the door of the house and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the stairway and look up at the bedroom door just at the head of the stair. He bypasses the stairs and slowly makes his way to the kitchen at the far end of the hall. He enters the kitchen and drops wearily into a chair. Meanwhile, Mary is seated at a small desk, engrossed in calculating in a small notebook. After a moment, she tears the page out of the notebook and, rising, begins to shred it into small pieces. She goes into the bathroom, drops the pieces into the toilet bowl, and flushes the toilet. Then she drops her robe, steps into the tub, and turns the shower on. For a moment, we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a woman fall across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, grasps the shower curtain, and rips it aside, causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Norman is looked at by a picture hanging on the far end of the wall he is leaning against. It is reached by him, touched, and the small frame is reluctantly lifted off the wall by him. A tiny circle of light is hit on Norman's face from the hole in the wall behind the picture. This end of the room is dimmed to such a degree that the light striking Norman's face is seen clearly by us. Norman is approached by us, extremely close, until the screen is filled by his profile, and his eye is hit by the tiny spot of light. The small hole through which the light comes is seen by us, and through it, Norman peeps. Into Mary's cabin, we look through the hole and Mary is seen undressing; her bra and half-slip are worn by her. A bit is stooped over by her, her hands are placed behind her upper back, and her bra is begun to be unhooked by her. As Mary removes her bra, she is watched by Norman, and the unseen figure of Mary is run up and down by his eye. A robe is just slipped into by Mary, and her complete nudity is covered. From the hole, Norman turns, and for a moment, we are faced by him before turning continues until the small parlor window can be looked through by him. The picture is quickly and precisely rehung over the hole in the wall, by him, he turns and the parlor is started out of by him. Through the office and out onto the porch, he goes, the door not even being bothered to be closed behind him by him. Along the porch, Norman walks, and the big house is walked towards. On the path, a pause is made by him, the light in the bedroom window is looked up at by him, then he pulls himself up, his shoulders are squared, and up the path, he strides manfully. The door of the house is opened by him and he enters. At the foot of the stairway, he pauses and the bedroom door just at the head of the stair is looked up at by him. The stairs are bypassed by him, and he slowly makes his way to the kitchen at the far end of the hall. Into a chair, he drops wearily as he enters the kitchen. Meanwhile, at a small desk, Mary is seated, engrossed in figuring in a small notebook. After a moment, the page is torn out of the notebook by her and rising, it is begun to be ripped into small pieces by her. Into the bathroom, she goes, the pieces are dropped into the toilet bowl by her, and the toilet is flushed by her. Then her robe is dropped, into the tub, she steps, and the shower is turned on by her. For a moment, Mary is watched by us as she washes and soaps herself. The bathroom door is then seen being pushed slowly open and across the shower curtain, the shadow of a woman falls. To the curtain, Mary's back is turned. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, the shower curtain is grasped, and it is ripped aside by the hand, causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Norman examines a picture on the wall, touches it, and hesitantly removes the frame. A small light from a hole behind the picture illuminates his face. The dim room highlights the light on Norman's face as we zoom in until his profile fills the screen, and the light hits his eye. He peeks through the hole into Mary's cabin, watching her undress to her bra and half-slip. As Mary removes her bra and slips into a robe, Norman's gaze follows her unseen figure. He turns from the hole, faces us briefly, then rehangs the picture and exits the parlor, leaving the door open. Norman walks along the porch toward the big house, pauses to look at the bedroom light, then strides up the path. Entering the house, he pauses at the stairs but heads to the kitchen, where he sits wearily. Meanwhile, Mary, at a desk, tears a notebook page, rips it into pieces, and flushes them in the bathroom. She drops her robe, steps into the tub, and showers. As she washes, the bathroom door opens, and a woman's shadow falls across the shower curtain. A hand suddenly rips the curtain aside, and horror erupts on Mary's face.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Norman examines a picture on the wall, touches it, and removes the frame, revealing a hole. Light from the hole illuminates his face in the dim room. We zoom in on Norman's profile as light hits his eye. He peeks through the hole into Mary's cabin, watching her undress. Mary removes her bra and slips into a robe. Norman turns away, rehangs the picture, and exits the parlor, leaving the door open. He walks toward the big house, pauses to look at the bedroom light, then enters the house, bypasses the stairs, and goes to the kitchen, sitting wearily. Meanwhile, Mary, at a desk, tears a notebook page, flushes it, and showers. A shadow appears, and a hand rips the shower curtain aside, causing Mary to look horrified.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Norman, standing quietly and contemplatively, gazes intently at a picture that is hanging on the far end of the wall against which he is leaning. After a moment of hesitation, he reaches out to it, touches it gently, and with a sense of reluctance, lifts the small frame off the wall. As he does so, a tiny circle of light emerges, casting a glow on Norman's face from the hole in the wall that was hidden behind the picture. This particular end of the room is shrouded in dimness, which allows us to clearly observe the light as it strikes Norman's face. We move in closer to Norman, extremely close, until his profile completely fills the screen, and the small spot of light is seen hitting his eye. We notice the small hole through which the light is coming, and we see Norman peering through it. Through this hole, we are able to look into Mary's cabin, where we see Mary undressing; she is wearing her bra and a half-slip. She bends over slightly, places her hands behind her upper back, and begins the process of unhooking her bra. Norman watches intently as Mary removes her bra, and we see his eye moving up and down, following the unseen figure of Mary. Mary is just slipping into a robe, covering her complete nudity. Norman then turns away from the hole, faces us for a brief moment, and continues turning until he can look out the small parlor window. With quick and precise movements, he rehangs the picture over the hole in the wall, turns around, and starts to leave the parlor. We observe him as he moves through the office and steps out onto the porch, not even bothering to close the door behind him. Norman walks along the porch, heading in the direction of the big house. Once he is on the path, he pauses, looks up at the light shining in the bedroom window, then pulls himself up, squares his shoulders, and strides manfully up the path. He opens the door of the house and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the stairway and look up at the bedroom door situated just at the head of the stairs. He bypasses the stairs and slowly makes his way to the kitchen located at the far end of the hall. He enters the kitchen and drops wearily into a chair. Meanwhile, Mary is seated at a small desk, deeply engrossed in figuring in a small notebook. After a moment, she tears the page out of the notebook and, rising from her seat, begins to rip it into small pieces. She goes into the bathroom, drops the pieces into the toilet bowl, and flushes the toilet. Then she drops her robe, steps into the tub, and turns the shower on. For a moment, we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open, and the shadow of a woman falls across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, grasps the shower curtain, and rips it aside, causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Norman stands in a quiet, contemplative manner, gazing intently at a picture that is hanging on the far end of the wall. He is leaning against this wall, lost in his thoughts. After a moment of hesitation that seems to weigh heavily on him, he reaches out with a certain cautiousness, touching the picture gently with his hand. With a sense of reluctance that is almost palpable, he carefully lifts the small frame off the wall. As he performs this action, a tiny circle of light suddenly emerges, casting a distinct glow on Norman's face. This light comes from a hole in the wall that was previously concealed behind the picture. This particular section of the room is enveloped in dimness, which allows us to clearly observe the way the light illuminates Norman's face. Slowly, we move in closer to Norman, getting extremely close, until his profile completely fills the screen, and the small spot of light is seen reflecting in his eye. We notice the small hole through which this light is coming, and we see Norman peering through it. Through this hole, our view shifts into Mary's cabin, where we see Mary as she is undressing; she is wearing her bra and a half-slip. She bends over slightly and places her hands behind her upper back, beginning the process of unhooking her bra. With keen interest, Norman watches as Mary removes her bra, and we see his eye moving up and down, following the unseen figure of Mary as she moves. Mary is just slipping into a robe, her complete nudity now covered. Norman then turns away from the hole, briefly facing us for a moment, and continues to turn until he can look out the small parlor window. With quick and precise movements, he rehanges the picture over the hole in the wall, then turns around and starts to leave the parlor. We observe him as he moves through the office and then steps out onto the porch, not even bothering to close the door behind him. Norman walks along the porch, heading with determination in the direction of the big house. Once he is on the path, he pauses for a moment, looks up at the light shining in the bedroom window, then pulls himself up, squares his shoulders, and strides confidently up the path. He opens the door of the house and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the stairway, and his eyes follow the path up to the bedroom door situated just at the head of the stairs. He chooses to bypass the stairs, slowly making his way instead to the kitchen located at the far end of the hall. He enters the kitchen and, with a weary demeanor, drops into a chair. Meanwhile, Mary is seated at a small desk, deeply engrossed in figuring numbers in a small notebook. After a moment of intense concentration, she tears the page out of the notebook and, rising from her seat, begins to meticulously rip it into small, insignificant pieces. She proceeds into the bathroom, drops the pieces into the toilet bowl, and flushes them away. Then, she lets her robe fall, steps gracefully into the tub, and turns the shower on. For a moment, we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself, lost in the simple act of cleansing. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open, and the ominous shadow of a woman falls across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain, completely unaware of what is happening. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, grasps the shower curtain, and violently rips it aside, causing a look of pure, unadulterated horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Norman stands leaning against the wall, his eyes fixated on a picture hanging at the far end. He takes a moment to study it before deciding to move. He pushes himself off the wall, takes a few steps forward, and reaches the picture. His fingers extend to touch the frame, feeling its texture, and with a hint of reluctance, he carefully lifts the small frame off the wall. As he does so, a tiny circle of light emerges from the hole behind the picture, casting a beam onto Norman's face. The dimness of this end of the room accentuates the light, making it clearly visible as it strikes his features. We draw closer to Norman, inching nearer until his profile dominates the screen, and the pinpoint of light aligns perfectly with his eye. Through this small hole, Norman peers, and we follow his gaze into Mary's cabin. Inside, Mary is undressing, clad in her bra and half-slip. She bends slightly, her hands reaching behind her upper back as she begins to unhook her bra. Norman observes intently as Mary removes her bra, his eye tracing the contours of her unseen figure. Mary then slips into a robe, concealing her nudity. Norman, having seen enough, turns away from the hole, momentarily facing us before continuing his turn to look out the small parlor window. With swift precision, he rehangs the picture over the hole, concealing it once more, and turns to leave the parlor. He moves through the office and steps out onto the porch, leaving the door ajar behind him. Norman walks along the porch, heading towards the big house. Upon reaching the path, he pauses, glancing up at the light shining from the bedroom window. He gathers himself, straightening his posture, and strides purposefully up the path. He reaches the house, opens the door, and steps inside. At the foot of the stairway, he pauses, his gaze lifting to the bedroom door at the top. Choosing not to ascend, he bypasses the stairs and proceeds slowly down the hall to the kitchen at the far end. Entering the kitchen, he drops into a chair, weariness evident in his demeanor. Meanwhile, Mary sits at a small desk, absorbed in calculations in a small notebook. After a moment, she tears a page from the notebook, rises, and begins tearing it into small pieces. She moves to the bathroom, drops the pieces into the toilet bowl, and flushes them away. She then lets her robe fall, steps into the tub, and turns on the shower. For a brief moment, we watch as Mary washes and soaps herself. Suddenly, the bathroom door creaks open slowly, and the shadow of a woman is cast across the shower curtain. With her back turned to the curtain, Mary remains unaware until a hand suddenly reaches up, grasps the shower curtain, and yanks it aside, causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Norman examines a picture on the wall, removes it, and peers through the hole behind it, which casts a small circle of light on his face. He spies on Mary in her cabin as she undresses, watching intently until she covers herself with a robe. Norman then rehanges the picture, exits the parlor, and walks along the porch toward the big house. He pauses to look at the light in the bedroom window, composes himself, and enters the house. Instead of going upstairs, he heads to the kitchen and sits down wearily. Meanwhile, Mary, after working on a notebook, tears a page into pieces, flushes them down the toilet, and steps into the shower. As she washes, a shadow falls across the shower curtain, which is suddenly ripped aside, leaving Mary in horror.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Norman, standing in a small dimly lit room in the famed Bates Motel, looks at a picture hanging on the far end of the wall he is leaning against, reaches it, touches it, and reluctantly lifts the small frame off the wall. A tiny circle of light hits Norman's face from the hole in the wall behind the picture, a peep hole cleverly concealed by his late mother to spy on guests in the adjacent room. This end of the room is very dim, allowing us to see clearly the light striking Norman's face. We move close to Norman, extremely close, until his profile fills the screen, and the tiny spot of light hits his eye. We see the small hole through which the light comes, and Norman peeps through. Through the hole, we look into Mary’s cabin, at Norman's family-owned motel where each cabin offers a sense of rustic seclusion, and see Mary undressing; she is in her bra and half-slip. She stoops over a bit, places her hands behind her upper back, and begins to unhook her bra. Norman watches as Mary removes her bra, and we see his eye run up and down the unseen figure of Mary. Mary is just slipping into a robe, covering her complete nudity. Norman turns from the hole, faces us for a moment, continues turning until he can look out the small parlor window. Quickly and precisely, he rehangs the picture over the hole in the wall, turns, and starts out of the parlor. We see him go through the office, part of the modestly run-down facade of the once-busy motel, and out onto the porch, not even bothering to close the door behind him. Norman walks along the porch, in the direction of the big house, a Victorian structure that looms ominously behind the motel and is widely rumored to be haunted. Once on the path, he pauses, looks up at the light in the bedroom window, then pulls himself up, squares his shoulders, and strides manfully up the path. He opens the door of the house and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the stairway, known for its creaky steps lined with worn carpet, and look up at the bedroom door just at the head of the stair. He bypasses the stairs and slowly makes his way to the kitchen at the far end of the hall. He enters the kitchen and drops wearily into a chair. Meanwhile, Mary is seated at a small desk, engrossed in figuring in a small notebook, which contains calculations regarding the sum of money she plans to keep hidden. After a moment, she tears the page out of the notebook and, rising, begins to rip it into small pieces. She goes into the bathroom, drops the pieces into the toilet bowl, and flushes the toilet. Then she drops her robe, steps into the tub, and turns the shower on. For a moment, we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself in an old claw-foot tub that features prominently in the lore of the motel. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a woman fall across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, grasps the shower curtain, and rips it aside, causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Norman walks along the porch in the direction of the big house. Once on the path he pauses looks up at the light in the bedroom window then pulls himself up squares his shoulders and strides manfully up the path. He opens the door of the house and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the stairway and look up at the bedroom door just at the head of the stair. He bypasses the stairs and slowly makes his way to the kitchen at the far end of the hall. He enters the kitchen and drops wearily into a chair. Meanwhile Mary is seated at a small desk engrossed in figuring in a small notebook. After a moment she tears the page out of the notebook and rising begins to rip it into small pieces. She goes into the bathroom drops the pieces into the toilet bowl and flushes the toilet. Then she drops her robe steps into the tub and turns the shower on. For a moment we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a woman fall across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly a hand reaches up grasps the shower curtain and rips it aside causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. Norman walks along the porch in the direction of the big house. Once on the path he pauses looks up at the light in the bedroom window then pulls himself up squares his shoulders and strides manfully up the path. He opens the door of the house and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the stairway and look up at the bedroom door just at the head of the stair. He bypasses the stairs and slowly makes his way to the kitchen at the far end of the hall. He enters the kitchen and drops wearily into a chair. Meanwhile Mary is seated at a small desk engrossed in figuring in a small notebook. After a moment she tears the page out of the notebook and rising begins to rip it into small pieces. She goes into the bathroom drops the pieces into the toilet bowl and flushes the toilet. Then she drops her robe steps into the tub and turns the shower on. For a moment we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a woman fall across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly a hand reaches up grasps the shower curtain and rips it aside causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Norman looks at a picture hanging on the far end of the wall. he is leaning against reaches it touches it and reluctantly lifts the small frame off the wall. A tiny circle of light hits Norman's face from the hole in the wall behind the picture. This end of the room is very dim allowing us to see clearly the light striking Norman's face. We move close to Norman extremely close until his profile fills the screen and the tiny spot of light hits his eye. We see the small hole through which the light comes and Norman peeps through. Through the hole we look into Mary's cabin and see Mary undressing. After a moment she tears the page out of the notebook and rising begins to rip it into small pieces. She goes into the bathroom drops the pieces into the toilet bowl and flushes the toilet. Then she drops her robe steps into the tub and turns the shower on. For a moment we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a woman fall across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly a hand reaches up grasps the shower curtain and rips it aside causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Norman looks at a picture hanging on the far end of the wall. he is leaning against reaches it touches it and reluctantly lifts the small frame off the wall. A tiny circle of light hits Norman's face from the hole in the wall behind the picture. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a woman fall across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly a hand reaches up grasps the shower curtain and rips it aside causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: The owl looks at a picture hanging on the far end of the wall it is leaning against, reaches it, touches it, and reluctantly lifts the small frame off the wall. A tiny circle of light hits the owl's face from the hole in the wall behind the picture. This end of the room is very dim, allowing us to see clearly the light striking the owl's face. We move close to the owl, extremely close, until its profile fills the screen, and the tiny spot of light hits its eye. We see the small hole through which the light comes, and the owl peeps through. Through the hole, we look into the dolphin's cabin and see the dolphin undressing; it is in its bra and half-slip. It stoops over a bit, places its hands behind its upper back, and begins to unhook its bra. The owl watches as the dolphin removes its bra, and we see its eye run up and down the unseen figure of the dolphin. The dolphin is just slipping into a robe, covering its complete nudity. The owl turns from the hole, faces us for a moment, continues turning until it can look out the small parlor window. Quickly and precisely, it rehangs the picture over the hole in the wall, turns, and starts out of the parlor. We see it go through the office and out onto the porch, not even bothering to close the door behind it. The owl walks along the porch, in the direction of the big house. Once on the path, it pauses, looks up at the light in the bedroom window, then pulls itself up, squares its shoulders, and strides manfully up the path. It opens the door of the house and enters. We see it pause at the foot of the stairway and look up at the bedroom door just at the head of the stair. It bypasses the stairs and slowly makes its way to the kitchen at the far end of the hall. It enters the kitchen and drops wearily into a chair. Meanwhile, the dolphin is seated at a small desk, engrossed in figuring in a small notebook. After a moment, it tears the page out of the notebook and, rising, begins to rip it into small pieces. It goes into the bathroom, drops the pieces into the toilet bowl, and flushes the toilet. Then it drops its robe, steps into the tub, and turns the shower on. For a moment, we watch the dolphin as it washes and soaps itself. We then see the bathroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a kangaroo fall across the shower curtain. The dolphin's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, grasps the shower curtain, and rips it aside, causing a look of pure horror to erupt on its face.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Norman looks at a tapestry hanging on the far end of the bookshelf he is leaning against, reaches it, touches it, and reluctantly lifts the small quilt off the bookshelf. A tiny triangle of light hits Norman's face from the crack in the bookshelf behind the tapestry. This end of the study is very dim, allowing us to see clearly the light striking Norman's face. We move close to Norman, extremely close, until his profile fills the screen, and the tiny spot of light hits his eye. We see the small gap through which the light comes, and Norman peeps through. Through the gap, we look into Mary's cabin and see Mary undressing; she is in her tank top and half-slip. She stoops over a bit, places her hands behind her upper back, and begins to untie her tank top. Norman watches as Mary removes her tank top, and we see his eye run up and down the unseen figure of Mary. Mary is just slipping into a dress, covering her complete nudity. Norman turns from the gap, faces us for a moment, continues turning until he can look out the small greenhouse window. Quickly and precisely, he rehangs the tapestry over the gap in the bookshelf, turns, and starts out of the greenhouse. We see him go through the study and out onto the balcony, not even bothering to close the door behind him. Norman walks along the balcony, in the direction of the big barn. Once on the track, he pauses, looks up at the glow in the dining window, then pulls himself up, squares his shoulders, and strides manfully up the track. He opens the door of the barn and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the ladder and look up at the storage door just at the head of the ladder. He bypasses the ladder and slowly makes his way to the pantry at the far end of the corridor. He enters the pantry and drops wearily into a stool. Meanwhile, Mary is seated at a small vanity, engrossed in doodling in a small sketchbook. After a moment, she tears the page out of the sketchbook and, rising, begins to shred it into tiny pieces. She goes into the laundry room, drops the pieces into the washer, and turns the washer on. Then she drops her dress, steps into the shower stall, and turns the water on. For a moment, we watch Mary as she washes and soaps herself. We then see the laundry room door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a woman fall across the shower stall. Mary's back is turned to the shower stall. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, grasps the shower curtain, and rips it aside, causing a look of pure horror to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Norman glances at a picture hanging on the far end of the wall he is leaning against, reaches it, pokes it, and cheerfully lifts the small frame off the wall. A tiny circle of light grazes Norman's cheek from the hole in the wall behind the picture. This end of the room is very dim, allowing us to see clearly the light brushing Norman's face. We shift close to Norman, extremely close, until his profile covers the screen, and the tiny spot of light touches his ear. We observe the small hole through which the light emerges, and Norman glances through. Through the hole, we peer into Mary's cabin and see Mary rearranging her clothes; she is in her bra and half-slip. She leans over a bit, places her hands behind her upper back, and starts to fasten her bra. Norman observes as Mary adjusts her bra, and we see his eye glide up and down the unseen figure of Mary. Mary is just slipping into a robe, masking her complete nudity. Norman swivels from the hole, gazes at us for a moment, continues turning until he can glance out the small parlor window. Swiftly and deliberately, he repositions the picture over the hole in the wall, spins around, and edges out of the parlor. We observe him stroll through the office and out onto the porch, not even taking the time to close the door behind him. Norman paces along the porch, in the direction of the big house. Once on the path, he halts, gazes up at the light in the bedroom window, then straightens himself up, squares his shoulders, and marches confidently up the path. He swings open the door of the house and enters. We see him pause at the foot of the stairway and stare up at the bedroom door just at the head of the stair. He bypasses the stairs and slowly saunters to the kitchen at the far end of the hall. He steps into the kitchen and plops wearily into a chair. Meanwhile, Mary is situated at a small desk, absorbed in scribbling in a small notebook. After a moment, she tears the page out of the notebook and, standing up, starts to shred it into tiny pieces. She walks into the bathroom, drops the pieces into the sink, and turns on the faucet. Then she discards her robe, steps into the tub, and pulls the curtain closed. For a moment, we observe Mary as she hums and rubs her skin. We then see the bathroom door being nudged slowly open and the shadow of a woman stretch across the shower curtain. Mary's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly, a hand reaches up, clasps the shower curtain, and tears it aside, causing a look of pure surprise to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Eleanor glances at a sculpture perched on the far edge of the bookshelf she is leaning against, approaches it, touches it, and hesitantly lifts the small statue off the shelf. A tiny square of light catches Eleanor's cheek from the crack in the bookshelf behind the sculpture. This corner of the library is very dim, allowing us to see clearly the light touching Eleanor's cheek. We move close to Eleanor, incredibly close, until her silhouette fills the screen, and the tiny beam of light touches her nose. We see the small crack through which the light enters, and Eleanor peeks through. Through the crack, we look into Sarah's hut and see Sarah changing clothes; she is in her tank top and shorts. She bends slightly, places her hands behind her head, and begins to untie her tank top. Eleanor watches as Sarah removes her tank top, and we see her gaze travel up and down the unseen form of Sarah. Sarah is just slipping into a gown, covering her entire nudity. Eleanor turns from the crack, faces us briefly, continues turning until she can look out the small study window. Quickly and precisely, she replaces the sculpture over the crack in the bookshelf, turns, and begins to leave the study. We see her move through the hallway and out onto the patio, not even bothering to close the gate behind her. Eleanor strolls along the patio, in the direction of the large cottage. Once on the trail, she hesitates, glances up at the glow in the attic window, then draws herself up, squares her shoulders, and strides boldly up the trail. She opens the door of the cottage and enters. We see her pause at the bottom of the staircase and look up at the attic door just at the top of the stairs. She bypasses the stairs and slowly makes her way to the pantry at the far end of the corridor. She enters the pantry and drops wearily into a stool. Meanwhile, Sarah is seated at a small table, engrossed in writing in a small journal. After a moment, she tears the page out of the journal and, standing, begins to shred it into small fragments. She goes into the washroom, drops the fragments into the sink, and turns the faucet on. Then she drops her gown, steps into the basin, and turns the faucet on. For a moment, we watch Sarah as she rinses and lathers herself. We then see the washroom door being pushed slowly open and the shadow of a figure fall across the basin curtain. Sarah's back is turned to the curtain. Suddenly, a fist reaches up, grasps the basin curtain, and yanks it aside, causing a look of utter disbelief to erupt on her face.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Frank examines a painting dangling on the far end of the ceiling he is reclining against, strolls to it, nudges it, and hesitantly drags the tiny sculpture off the ceiling. A tiny square of light strikes Frank's neck from the gap in the ceiling behind the painting. This section of the hallway is very dim, allowing us to perceive clearly the light landing on Frank's neck. We glide near to Frank, exceedingly near, until his silhouette fills the frame, and the tiny patch of light strikes his cheek. We observe the tiny gap through which the light emerges, and Frank peers through. Through the gap, we look into Lily's study and see Lily dressing; she is in her sweater and jeans. She bends over a bit, places her fingers behind her lower back, and starts to fasten her jeans. Frank stares as Lily secures her jeans, and we observe his cheek move over the unseen outline of Lily. Lily is just slipping into a sweater, covering her complete nudity. Frank swivels from the gap, faces us briefly, continues swiveling until he can glance out the small dining room window. Swiftly and meticulously, he rehangs the painting over the gap in the ceiling, swivels, and ambles out of the dining room. We watch him pass through the workshop and out onto the terrace, not even taking the trouble to fasten the door behind him. Frank ambles along the terrace, in the direction of the large hut. Once on the trail, he halts, glances up at the light in the study window, then hauls himself up, steadies his posture, and marches boldly up the trail. He unlatches the door of the hut and steps inside. We observe him halt at the foot of the ladder and glance up at the study door just at the head of the ladder. He sidesteps the ladder and gradually makes his way to the pantry at the far end of the corridor. He steps into the pantry and collapses wearily into a stool. Meanwhile, Lily is perched at a small dresser, fascinated in narrating in a small journal. After a moment, she tears the sheet out of the journal and, standing, commences to shred it into tiny fragments. She proceeds into the laundry room, drops the fragments into the washbasin, and drains the washbasin. Then she discards her sweater, steps into the basin, and switches the faucet on. For a moment, we observe Lily as she rinses and scrubs herself. We then see the laundry room door being nudged gradually ajar and the silhouette of a child cast across the bath curtain. Lily's front is turned to the curtain. Abruptly, a fist reaches up, grabs the bath curtain, and tears it aside, provoking a look of pure terror to burst on her face.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Norman gazes at a painting hanging on the far side of the bookshelf he is reclining against, approaches it, taps it, and reluctantly slides the tiny easel off the shelf. A small square of shadow grazes Norman's cheek from the crack in the shelf behind the painting. This side of the library is very bright, allowing us to see clearly the shadow grazing Norman's cheek. We drift away from Norman, moderately far, until his silhouette vanishes from the screen, and the small square of shadow grazes his shoulder. We glimpse the large crack through which the shadow emerges, and Norman peers through. Through the crack, we peer into Mary's room and see Mary dressing; she is in her blouse and skirt. She bends over slightly, places her hands before her lower legs, and begins to tie her shoes. Norman observes as Mary puts on her shoes, and we see his eye glide left and right along the unseen shape of Mary. Mary is just slipping out of a dress, revealing her complete attire. Norman pivots from the crack, turns to see us for a moment, continues rotating until he can glance out the large hallway window. Slowly and randomly, he slides the painting over the crack in the shelf, pivots, and steps out of the library. We see him move through the lobby and onto the deck, not even caring to open the door before him. Norman strolls along the deck, in the direction of the small shed. Once on the trail, he stops, glances down at the shadow on the garden path, then pushes himself down, rolls his shoulders, and marches boldly down the trail. He closes the window of the shed and exits. We see him pause at the top of the ladder and glance down at the basement trapdoor just at the bottom of the ladder. He bypasses the ladder and quickly guides his way to the lounge at the near end of the corridor. He enters the lounge and sits heavily into a couch. Meanwhile, Mary is perched at a large table, intrigued in drawing on a large notepad. After a moment, she folds the sheet into the notepad and, falling, begins to toss it into large chunks. She walks into the bedroom, tosses the chunks into the sink, and fills the sink. Then she pulls her dress, steps onto the rug, and turns the fan on. For a moment, we watch Mary as she dries and powders herself. We then see the bedroom window being slid quietly closed and the silhouette of a man cast across the curtain blinds. Mary's front is turned to the blinds. Abruptly, an arm reaches down, snatches the curtain blinds, and snaps it aside, causing a look of pure curiosity to appear on her face.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Daisy gazes at a poster floating on the opposite edge of the desk she is sprawling over, stretches towards it, nudges it, and unwillingly pulls the tiny vase off the shelf. A small beam of darkness grazes Daisy's hand from the crack in the door behind the poster. This side of the attic is quite bright, obscuring the shadow hitting Daisy's hand. We drift away from Daisy, incredibly distant, until her silhouette vanishes from view, and the faint trace of darkness grazes her foot. We observe the large crack through which the shadow emerges, and Daisy glances around. Through the crack, we peer into Tim's attic and find Tim dressing up; he is in his coat and coat-tails. He stands up straight, places his feet on the lower floor, and stops fastening his coat. Daisy listens as Tim puts on his coat, and we notice her foot dance side to side with the unseen silhouette of Tim. Tim is just stepping out of the suit, uncovering his entire brightness. Daisy turns away from the crack, turns towards us for a second, keeps turning until she can gaze into the large hallway mirror. Slowly and casually, she unhooks the poster at the crack in the door, turns, and wanders into the closet. We watch her stroll through the hallway and into the yard, not even attempting to shut the window behind her. Daisy skips across the yard, towards the tiny cave. Once on the trail, she halts, glances down at the shadow in the living room ceiling, then hoists herself down, narrows her knees, and hops gracefully down the trail. She shuts the window of the cave and exits. We observe her halt at the head of the ladder and gaze down at the living room window just at the foot of the ladder. She crosses over the ladder and swiftly makes her way to the pantry at the near side of the room. She exits the pantry and stands energetically on a table. Meanwhile, Tim is lying on a large couch, absorbed in painting on a large canvas. After a moment, he sticks the page onto the canvas and, falling, ceases to tear it into large chunks. He enters the cellar, sticks the chunks onto the ceiling tiles, and opens the window. Then he lifts his suit, jumps out of the pool, and shuts the lights off. For a second, we observe Tim as he dries and dresses himself. We then glimpse the cellar window being yanked swiftly closed and the shape of a child rise beneath the pool tiles. Tim's front is facing the tiles. Instantly, a foot reaches down, releases the pool tiles, and bolts them away, causing a look of utter joy to erupt on his face.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Norman examines a picture on the wall, revealing a small hole that projects light onto his face in the dim room. Looking through the hole, he spies on Mary undressing in her cabin. As Mary begins to put on a robe, Norman turns away, rehangs the picture, and exits the room without closing the door. He walks toward the big house, glancing at the lighted bedroom window before entering the house and heading to the kitchen, where he sits wearily. Meanwhile, Mary tears up a page from a notebook and flushes it away before showering. As she washes, the bathroom door slowly opens, and a shadow falls across the curtain. Suddenly, a hand pulls the curtain aside, and Mary displays a look of pure horror.
